name: SIEMPRE
goal:
Government Relations and Strategic Communications

Our core activities lay at the intersection of business' demands and interests of the public sector. We help businesses to leverage their potential with each project by involving the right kind of governmental stakeholders.
We provide strategic advice and guidance in positioning our clients within the projects initiated by the public sector.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: We are engaged in the matters concerning the transport policy, issues relevant to the climate change and energy efficiency, cohesion policy, regional policy
